attributes.action: say NO to Kenton Lane McDonald's
attributes.additional_details: McDonald's restaurant have submitted plans for a two storey restaurant to be built on the site of the old Crofter's Lodge pub on Kenton Lane. This will mean an increase in noise, pollution and traffic 24hours a day bringing misery to local residents. We want to enjoy our homes and gardens in peace and quiet. We want to sleep at night without a giant neon sign shining through our window. We do not want out children subjected to fast food advertising on their way to and from school!
